results.name: Binomial transform of A128064.
formula: A007318 * A128064 as infinite lower triangular matrices.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
program: (MAGMA) /* As triangle */ [[(k+1)*(Binomial(n,k)-Binomial(n,k+1)): k in [0..n]]: n in [0.. 15]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 12 2019
